En la ventana de terminal
> which git
> git --version

Luego usar el paquete "usethis"

[filter "lfs"]
	clean = git-lfs clean -- %f
	smudge = git-lfs smudge -- %f
	process = git-lfs filter-process
	required = true
[user]
	name = "DEV-iOS"
	email = "daniel.enriquez.v@upch.pe"
[core]
	editor = code --wait
	autocrlf = input
[init]
	defaultBranch = DEV-mac
